section: This agreement shall begin upon the date of its execution by MA and acceptance in writing by Company and shall remain in effect until the end of the current calendar year and shall be automatically renewed for successive one (1) year periods unless otherwise terminated according to the cancellation or termination provisions contained in paragraph 18 of this Agreement.
explanation: The agreement's initial term extends to the end of the calendar year, creating ambiguity regarding agreements executed late in the year. If executed in December, the initial term is very short, affecting the minimum quotas in Schedule A.

section: Notwithstanding the foregoing, as between Company and MA, MA shall be responsible as defined for providing customer and technical support to end users in the Territory. MA will notify Company immediately in the event that it is unable to respond effectively to any end users requests.
explanation: The text does not clearly define what 'as defined' means, making it difficult to determine the exact support responsibilities of MA. This lack of clarity can lead to disputes over the level and scope of support MA must provide.

section: MA shall pay to Company a quarterly service fee (the Service Fee) in the amount equal to US $15,000.00 on the first day of each quarter for the Term of this Agreement as set forth in Section 1 hereinabove, for each month that MA has no sales pursuant to this Schedule A, with the first payment due and payable on the date of execution of this Agreement.
explanation: The requirement to pay the service fee 'for each month that MA has no sales' contradicts the quarterly payment schedule. It's unclear if the fee applies to partial months or only full months with no sales, causing confusion.
